Irving.AirHogs Stadium: AirHogs Stadium is a stadium in Grand Prairie, Texas, for the American Association's Texas AirHogs. It is primarily used for baseball. It has a capacity of 5,445 people for baseball games and opened in May 2008. In addition to baseball, it plays host to various other concerts and events throughout the year. For a period of time, it was known as QuikTrip Park due to the sponsorship by the convenience store chain. In 2015, the city of Grand Prairie paid off the debt to build the stadium.
